Thank you for contacting Netwrix Technical Support.
My name is Artem, I will be assisting you with this ticket.

To help us expedite issue resolution and streamline our support for you, please, provide additional information from your side by answering these questions:


	What is a company name of the endpoint customer? 
	Currently the Netwrix Access Analyzer (Enterprise Auditor) installation folder is been filled up with files containing "_Extractor_" in their names. That is the main issue, correct?
	Could you please take screenshots of these files and share these screenshots with me?
	What jobs/solutions are currently configured and are running in this Netwrix Access Analyzer (Enterprise Auditor) installation? 
	When did this issue with "_Extractor_" files started to happen? Did it happen after configuring a new Data Collection/Job?
